products.title: William Morris Acanthus Vintage Blue Roman Blind

products.title: Vintage Bunch Roman Blind
products.description: Full of traditional style and charm, the vintage bunch roman blind features gorgeous vintage-inspired bouquets with blooming flowers and trailing foliage. In a contemporary colour palette of sweet pastel pinks, vibrant yellows, cool greys and soft neutrals, this blind beaut full of traditional style and charm, the vintage bunch roman blind features gorgeous vintage-inspired bouquets with blooming flowers and trailing foliage.

products.title: Button Spot Yellow Roman Blind
products.description: Bring the sunshine into your home all year round with the joyful button spot yellow roman blind by cath kidston. White spots are contrasted against the wonderfully vibrant yellow to create a simply sophisticated design that will bring the very best out of your interior.

products.title: Capri, Yellow - Roman Blind
products.description: If you're looking for something bold, bright, and just a little bit tropical, then you'll find it in the capri yellow, where a sunny yellow forms the base for gorgeous fuchsias, pale sky blues, and lush lime greens, tempered by the occasional gentle taupe, charcoal black, and soft white. Give the yellow pride of place by hanging in a contemporary living room. Keep the bases of the room, such as the walls and floor, neutral and unobtrusive, adding pale grey or taupe sofas, and accessorise with one or two of the brighter tones from the blind.

products.title: Corsica, Gold - Roman Blind
products.description: The corsica range is one filled with class and sophistication, without giving up its traditional floral roots. The gold offers this pretty floral pattern in a golden yellow and parchment grey, resulting in a stunningly understated feel all over. Give the gold a home in your living room or guest bedroom, where the subtle yellow tone will add a hint of cheer without overwhelming the room. Surround with greys and similar shades of yellow for a coordinated look, opting for silver fittings and fixtures, and perhaps the occasional ornament or oddment.

products.title: Kershaw, Gold - Roman Blind
products.description: The kershaw gold features a neutral blend of soft golds and gentle greys in the form of contemporary florals on a golden oatmeal background. The outcome is one of modern traditionalism, with an understated yet pretty effect that will suit any home. Use the gold as a subtle feature in a hallway or landing, where you might not want to overpower a smaller space but would like to add some interest and definition.

products.title: William Morris Sunflower Vintage Blue Roman Blind
products.description: Part of their william morris range in collaboration with the v&a, we just love the vintage blue tones of this sunflower roman blind. An original william morris design produced in 1879, the sunflower vintage blue roman blind is a true classic and is a great way of bringing the part of their william morris range in collaboration with the v&a, we just love the vintage blue tones of this sunflower roman blind.

products.title: William Morris Strawberry Thief Vintage Blush Roman Blind
products.description: An absolute classic, william morriss strawberry thief design has been in fashion since its design in 1883, and were still in love with this classic piece. From their william morris range, in collaboration with the v&a, their strawberry thief roman blind looks fabulous in cont an absolute classic, william morriss strawberry thief design has been in fashion since its design in 1883, and were still in love with this classic piece.

products.title: Emperor, Gold - Roman Blind
products.description: Transform an unadorned part of the home with the alluring and glowing emperor in gold, made from a silky thread and chiffon-style cloth, which forms into a luxury blind with ribbed texture to create elegant style with little effort. Mingle the gold with oatmeal, ivory, and golden hues to craft a sophisticated scheme with depth and elegance, adding sumptuous linen and sheer fabrics to complement the metallic sheen of the blind.

products.title: Rocco, Gold - Roman Blind
products.description: Produce a striking and sophisticated look with the rocco in gold, where plush thread meets fine cotton for a rich and plump blind with a cosy, downy texture, and incorporates a modern design with traditional style in opulent gold and biscuit hues. Blend this splendid and original design with alike textured cloths and plush fabrics in ivory and silk tones for an elegant and welcoming palette, including gilded accessories and eye-catching oddments in distinctive burnished gold to create an ongoing and coherent theme.

products.title: Selva, Gold - Roman Blind
products.description: Featuring a gorgeous, chenille-textured fabric in mustard gold, and a country-woven thread in homely cream, the selva gold is classic and conventional. The thick, lustrous cloth is durable and hardwearing, as well as warm and cosy, giving this blind both form and function. Provide your dining room with a subtle touch of grandeur by surrounding the gold with a plush, textured wallpaper in matching cream and camel.

products.title: Real Silk Pale Gold  Roman Blind
products.description: With just a touch of subtlety, this real silk pale gold roman blind brings elegance and grace into your home, in a flash. The soft, serene shade is the perfect shade of neutral. It works with light and dark schemes alike, whilst the touch of sheen makes sure your home is always with just a touch of subtlety, this real silk pale gold roman blind brings elegance and grace into your home, in a flash.
